title: Um? I lost my promos to Bronze 1 through one loss?
body:
I just hit my promos to Bronze 1, I lose my first one and I've already lost the series?

EDIT: Nvm, I just did a bit of research and it appears "dodging" champion select counts as one loss in promos.

(Problem that it wouldn't let me select my champion when it was my turn then it ended up kicking me)

replies.body: Surprised you lost the game... Bronze 2 easy.
